text: Moses ga helekai gi tuaahina o dono lodo go Hobab, tama daane a Jethro, tangada Midian, “Gimaadou bolo ga daamada gaa hula gi tenua Dimaadua ne helekai ai bolo e gaamai gi gimaadou. Mee guu hai dana hagababa bolo e hai Israel gi maluagina, malaa, hanimoi dalia gimaadou, gei gimaadou ga haga humalia goe.”
